question:
As a part of their Prioroty sector lending operations, Banks have been mandated a sub-target of 10% to disburse such loans to weaker sections. Which of the following is / are included in the Weaker Sections?
  1. Self Help Groups
  2. Pradhan Mantri Jan-DhanYojana Account holders with income less than Rs. 1 Lakh per annum
  3. Persons with disabilities
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
